gpt_critique.critique: Disagreement on No Poverty and Partnerships for the Goals: course emphasizes justice and multi-city sharing governance, not poverty or lower-bound partnerships.

No Poverty.reason: No explicit poverty reduction; only mentions justice and meeting needs, not poverty-specific outcomes.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Explicit multi-city case studies and governance aspects justify higher alignment than 5.0.
